welcome.learn_to_code_description:
Master the skills to read and write code,
build apps and games, and advance

welcome.build_project_description:
Make apps, games, websites, and more
with step-by-step guidance
welcome.join_community_description:
Get advice and inspiration from more
than 5 million learners

discovery_intro.title: Welcome to O-Learning!
discovery_intro.description:
Before you get started, we'll ask you a few
questions to create your personalized
curriculum. Are you ready?

discovery_list.title:
Why are you learning
to code?
discovery_list.experience_none_description: You're about to write your first line of code
discovery_list.experience_little_description: You've written small programs or webpages

discovery_course.title: Why do you want to learn?
discovery_course.description: You can always switch paths later on

discovery_goal.title:
How much time do you want to
spend learning?

discovery_notification.title:
When do you like to
be reminded?
